## Overview

**`r packageDescription("rtraining", fields = "Title")`:** `r packageDescription("rtraining", fields = "Description")`

The package currently contains my **R Training Log** and **R Setup Log** notebooks, which are viewable from the GitHub Pages URL: <https://jabenninghoff.github.io/rtraining/>.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jabenninghoff/rtraining")
```

Or using renv:

``` r
# install.packages("renv")
renv::install("jabenninghoff/rtraining")
```
